title: Cotton growing and spinning: Dogon people, Mali Highlands
creator_credit: Hermann Schlenker, Julien Bryan and International Film Foundation
brief_description: Shows how members of the Dogon tribe in the Mali highlands of Africa grow and spin cotton into cloth for their own unique puproses.
